Name: The Snowman's Journey
About the game: “The Snowman’s Journey” is a 3D Platformer adventure game. Help the lost snowman find his way home. Dangers both great and small stand in his way. Avoid rush-hour traffic, an avalanche of snowballs, succumbing to an icy river, and more! So grab a hot chocolate, a cozy blanket, and put on the fire. The holidays are here and a snowman is ready to begin his journey…
